text: Shrayer is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * David Shrayer-Petrov, (born 1936) Russian American novelist, poet, memoirist, translator and medical scientist * Maxim D. Shrayer (born 1967), Russian- American author, translator, and literary scholar * Michael Shrayer, American creator of the Electric Pencil in 1976, the first word processor for home computers == See also == * Schreyer * Scheier * Shroyer
title: Shrayer
